src: function handle({ app_metrica_device_id, auto_entity_map, cards }) { const verification = {'statuses': []}; if (typeof auto_entity_map === 'undefined' || typeof auto_entity_map.absolute_verification_deviсe_id === 'undefined' || typeof app_metrica_device_id === 'undefined') { return verification; } if ( typeof auto_entity_map.absolute_verification_deviсe_id[app_metrica_device_id] !== 'undefined' && auto_entity_map.absolute_verification_deviсe_id[app_metrica_device_id]) { for(const card of cards) { if( typeof card.verification_details !== 'undefined' && typeof card.verification_details.level !== 'undefined' && card.verification_details.level == '3ds') { continue; } verification.statuses.push({ 'id': card['id'], 'status': 'standard2_3ds', 'reason': 'common_errors.NEED_CARD_ANTIFRAUD' }); } } return verification; }

function handle({cards}) { for(const card of cards) { if(card['id'] === 'card_id1') { return {'statuses': [{'id': card['id'], 'status': 'standard2_3ds', 'reason': 'test_rule2_custom_reason'}]} } } return {'statuses': []}; }
